shieldlib.midnightconfig.title: Shield Lib Config
shieldlib.midnightconfig.enchantability_: Convention: 15 = Wood | 5 = Stone | 14 = Iron | 10 = Diamond | 22 = Gold
shieldlib.midnightconfig.universal_disab: If on, whenever any shield gets disabled, every type of shield will be disabled.
If off, then disabling a shield will only disabling shields of the same type
